page.description: Runs an Import job that was defined by the AlphaDAO Import builder. Returns two properties 'HasError' (.t./.f.) and 'ErrorText'. The 'jobDefn' input array has status on each object in the following properties: .countRecordsImported, .hasError, .errorText, .userCancelled
page.syntax: P a5_AlphaDAO_Import(C cs ,P jobDefn ,P options [,L flagSilent [,* argumentsPassedIn ]])
